text: Meghan Markle is STILL in Los Angeles ; How She ‘ Keeps in Touch ’ with Prince Harry Prince Harry's fiancée Meghan Markle is still in Los Angeles - - 5, 400 miles away from her prince charming. Oddly, Meghan hopped a flight to Los Angeles a day after she made her first public appearance on Harry's arm since they announced their unlikely engagement. Tongues were wagging in London when Meghan jetted to L. A. to visit her mom, Doria Ragland, for two weeks. Many Brits say it is highly inappropriate for a newly - engaged woman to suddenly abandon her fiancé and fly to another continent 5, 000 miles away.
